data.eml:eml: Ctenocheloides almeidai sp. nov., a new ghost shrimp from Brazil (Decapoda, Ctenochelidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Pachelle, Paulo P. G. (2013): Ctenocheloides almeidai sp. nov., a new ghost shrimp from Brazil (Decapoda, Ctenochelidae). Zootaxa 3613 (5): 482-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3613.5.4
